name: n_neighbors
short_desc: Number of neighbors to use by default for kneighbors queries.

name: weights
short_desc: Weight function used in prediction that determines how the points are weighted

name: p
short_desc: Power parameter for the Minkowski metric

name: algorithm
short_desc: Algorithm used to compute the nearest neighbors

name: leaf_size
short_desc: the number of leaves used in construction for either ball_tree or kd_tree
